service.method: SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(HD.ANN_NO,1,2),'BD',HD.BID_NO,HD.ANN_NO) AS ANN_NO , HD.ANN_ITEM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(HD.X_DOC_SUBMIT_DATE||HD.X_DOC_SUBMIT_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS X_DOC_SUBMIT_DATE_TIME -- 사용하지 않음 , CONVERT_DATE(HD.ANN_DATE ) AS ANN_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BID_BEGIN_DATE||BID_BEGIN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS BID_BEGIN_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BID_END_DATE||BID_END_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS BID_END_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BID_BEGIN_DATE||BID_BEGIN_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') ||' ~ '||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(BID_END_DATE||BID_END_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS BID_BEGIN_END_DATE , HD.CHANGE_USER_NAME_LOC , GETICOMCODE2(HD.HOUSE_CODE, 'M935_ICT', HD.STATUS ) AS STATUS_TEXT -- 사용의미없음 , HD.SIGN_PERSON_ID , HD.SIGN_STATUS , HD.BID_STATUS , HD.BID_NO , HD.BID_COUNT , HD.CHANGE_USER_ID , HD.STATUS AS STATUS , HD.PR_NO , HD.CTRL_CODE , GETICOMCODE2(HD.HOUSE_CODE, 'M974_ICT', HD.CONT_TYPE1 ) || ' / ' || GETICOMCODE2(HD.HOUSE_CODE, 'M973_ICT', HD.CONT_TYPE2 ) || ' / ' || GETICOMCODE2(HD.HOUSE_CODE, 'M930_ICT', HD.PROM_CRIT ) AS CONT_TYPE1_TEXT , (SELECT COUNT(Z.VENDOR_CODE) FROM ICOYBDAP_ICT Z WHERE Z.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND Z.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND Z.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT) AS VENDOR_COUNT -- 지정업체수 , (SELECT COUNT(VENDOR_CODE) FROM ICOMQTEE_ICT Z WHERE Z.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND Z.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND Z.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT) AS VENDOR_COUNT2 -- 참가업체수 , (SELECT COUNT(Z.VENDOR_CODE) FROM ICOYBDAP_ICT Z WHERE Z.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND Z.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND Z.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT AND Z.STATUS = 'R' AND Z.FINAL_FLAG = 'Y' ) AS VENDOR_COUNT3 -- 적격업체수 : FINAL_FLAG : 최종결과 , NULL AS SUM_AMT , (SELECT Z.CUR FROM ICOYBDDT_ICT Z WHERE Z.HOUSE_CODE = HD.HOUSE_CODE AND Z.BID_NO = HD.BID_NO AND Z.BID_COUNT = HD.BID_COUNT AND ROWNUM < 2) AS CUR , PG.VOTE_COUNT , CASE WHEN HD.ANN_VERSION IS NULL THEN (SELECT CODE FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE = 'VR001_ICT') ELSE HD.ANN_VERSION END AS ANN_VERSION , HD.BID_TYPE , NVL(HD.INP_CNF,'N') AS INP_CNF , (SELECT TEXT2 FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE = 'M967' AND CODE = NVL(HD.INP_CNF,'N')) AS INP_CNF_TEXT FROM ICOYBDHD_ICT HD LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOYBDPG_ICT PG ON HD.HOUSE_CODE = PG.HOUSE_CODE AND HD.BID_NO = PG.BID_NO AND HD.BID_COUNT = PG.BID_COUNT WHERE HD.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND HD.ANN_NO = $S{ANN_NO} AND HD.ANN_ITEM LIKE '%'||$S{ANN_ITEM}||'%' AND TO_NUMBER(PG.OPEN_DATE||PG.OPEN_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) AND HD.SIGN_STATUS IN ('T','P','C') --AND HD.BID_STATUS IN ('AC', 'UC') -- AC:공고중 UC:정정공고 AND HD.BID_STATUS IN ('AT','AP','AJ','AC','UT','UP','UJ','UC','RR','NB','SB') -- AT:작성(공고) UC:작성(정정공고) AND HD.CHANGE_USER_NAME_LOC LIKE '%'|| $S{CHANGE_USER_NAME} ||'%' AND HD.STATUS IN ('C' ,'R') AND PG.STATUS IN ('C' ,'R') AND HD.BID_TYPE = $S{BID_TYPE} AND HD.ADD_USER_DEPT = ${session.DEPARTMENT} ORDER BY HD.ANN_DATE DESC, HD.ADD_DATE DESC, HD.ADD_TIME DESC, HD.ANN_NO DESC

SELECT HD.CHANGE_USER_NAME_LOC ,HD.SIGN_PERSON_ID ,HD.SIGN_PERSON_NAME ,HD.SIGN_DATE ,HD.SIGN_STATUS ,HD.CHANGE_DATE ,HD.BID_TYPE ,HD.CONT_TYPE1 ,HD.CONT_TYPE2 ,GETICOMCODE2(HD.HOUSE_CODE, 'M974_ICT', HD.CONT_TYPE1) AS CONT_TYPE1_TEXT_D ,GETICOMCODE2(HD.HOUSE_CODE, 'M973_ICT', HD.CONT_TYPE2) AS CONT_TYPE2_TEXT_D ,NULL AS CONT_TYPE1_TEXT_O ,NULL AS CONT_TYPE2_TEXT_O ,NULL AS CONT_TYPE1_TEXT_CS ,NULL AS CONT_TYPE2_TEXT_CS ,HD.ANN_TITLE ,HD.BID_NO AS ANN_NO ,HD.ANN_DATE ,HD.ANN_ITEM ,HD.RD_DATE ,HD.DELY_PLACE ,HD.LIMIT_CRIT ,NULL AS LIMIT_CRIT_TEXT ,HD.PROM_CRIT ,GETICOMCODE2(HD.HOUSE_CODE, 'M930_ICT', HD.PROM_CRIT ) AS PROM_CRIT_NAME ,HD.APP_BEGIN_DATE ,HD.APP_BEGIN_TIME ,SUBSTR(HD.APP_BEGIN_TIME, 0, 2) AS APP_BEGIN_TIME_HOUR ,SUBSTR(HD.APP_BEGIN_TIME, 3, 2) AS APP_BEGIN_TIME_MINUTE ,HD.APP_END_DATE ,HD.APP_END_TIME ,SUBSTR(HD.APP_END_TIME, 0, 2) AS APP_END_TIME_HOUR ,SUBSTR(HD.APP_END_TIME, 3, 2) AS APP_END_TIME_MINUTE ,HD.APP_PLACE ,HD.APP_ETC ,HD.ATTACH_NO ,NULL AS ATTACH_CNT ,NULL AS VENDOR_CNT ,GETVENDORS_ICT(HD.HOUSE_CODE, HD.BID_NO, HD.BID_COUNT) AS VENDOR_VALUES ,HD.ANNOUNCE_DATE ,HD.ANNOUNCE_TIME_FROM ,HD.ANNOUNCE_TIME_TO ,HD.ANNOUNCE_AREA ,HD.ANNOUNCE_PLACE ,HD.ANNOUNCE_NOTIFIER ,HD.ANNOUNCE_RESP ,HD.DOC_FRW_DATE ,HD.ANNOUNCE_COMMENT ,HD.ANNOUNCE_FLAG ,HD.ANNOUNCE_TEL ,HD.BID_STATUS ,HD.ESTM_FLAG ,HD.COST_STATUS ,HD.PR_NO ,HD.CTRL_CODE ,HD.ANN_TIME ,PG.VOTE_COUNT ,PG.BID_BEGIN_DATE ,PG.BID_BEGIN_TIME ,SUBSTR(PG.BID_BEGIN_TIME, 0, 2) AS BID_BEGIN_TIME_HOUR ,SUBSTR(PG.BID_BEGIN_TIME, 3, 2) AS BID_BEGIN_TIME_MINUTE ,PG.BID_END_DATE ,PG.BID_END_TIME ,SUBSTR(PG.BID_END_TIME, 0, 2) AS BID_END_TIME_HOUR ,SUBSTR(PG.BID_END_TIME, 3, 2) AS BID_END_TIME_MINUTE ,PG.BID_PLACE ,PG.BID_ETC ,PG.OPEN_DATE ,PG.OPEN_TIME ,SUBSTR(PG.OPEN_TIME, 0, 2) AS OPEN_TIME_HOUR ,SUBSTR(PG.OPEN_TIME, 3, 2) AS OPEN_TIME_MINUTE ,HD.CTRL_AMT ,CERTV ,TIMESTAMP ,SIGN_CERT ,CRYP_CERT ,NULL AS LOCATION_CNT ,GETLOCATIONS(HD.HOUSE_CODE, HD.BID_NO, HD.BID_COUNT) AS LOCATION_VALUES ,HD.ESTM_KIND ,HD.ESTM_RATE ,HD.ESTM_MAX ,HD.ESTM_VOTE ,HD.FROM_CONT ,NULL AS FROM_CONT_TEXT ,NVL(HD.FROM_LOWER_BND, 0) AS FROM_LOWER_BND ,HD.ASUMTN_OPEN_YN ,HD.CONT_TYPE_TEXT ,HD.CONT_PLACE ,HD.BID_PAY_TEXT ,HD.BID_CANCEL_TEXT ,HD.BID_JOIN_TEXT ,HD.REMARK ,HD.ESTM_MAX_VOTE ,HD.STANDARD_POINT ,HD.TECH_DQ ,HD.AMT_DQ ,HD.BID_NO ,HD.BID_COUNT ,GETUSERNAME_ICT(HD.HOUSE_CODE, HD.ADD_USER_ID,'LOC') AS ADD_USER_NAME ,NULL AS ITEM_COUNT ,NULL AS BASIC_AMT ,HD.BID_EVAL_SCORE ,HD.REPORT_ETC ,HD.X_DOC_SUBMIT_DATE ,HD.X_DOC_SUBMIT_TIME FROM ICOYBDHD_ICT HD , ICOYBDPG_ICT PG WHERE HD.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND HD.BID_NO = ${BID_NO} AND HD.BID_COUNT = ${BID_COUNT} AND HD.HOUSE_CODE = PG.HOUSE_CODE AND HD.BID_NO = PG.BID_NO AND HD.BID_COUNT = PG.BID_COUNT AND HD.STATUS IN ('C', 'R') AND PG.STATUS IN ('C', 'R')

SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, A.* FROM ( SELECT
VN.VENDOR_NAME_LOC AS VENDOR_NAME , AD.CEO_NAME_LOC , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(APP_DATE||APP_TIME, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS APP_DATE_TIME , AP.UNT_FLAG , AP.ACHV_FLAG , AP.FINAL_FLAG , AP.INCO_REASON , AP.EXPLAN_FLAG , GETICOMCODE2(AP.HOUSE_CODE, 'M967', AP.GUAR_TYPE ) AS GUAR_TYPE_TEXT , AP.BID_CANCEL , AP.VENDOR_CODE , NULL AS ATTACH_CNT -- 보증서 파일수 , NULL AS ATTACH_NO -- 보증서 파일NO , NULL AS ATTACH_NO_H , PI.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , PI.MOBILE_NO AS MOBILE_NO , PI.EMAIL AS EMAIL , RANK() OVER( PARTITION BY PI.VENDOR_CODE ORDER BY PI.SEQ) AS ORDER_SEQ FROM ICOYBDAP_ICT AP , ICOMVNGL_ICT VN , ICOMADDR_ICT AD ,( SELECT HOUSE_CODE,VENDOR_CODE,USER_NAME,MOBILE_NO,EMAIL,SEQ FROM ICOMVNCP_ICT WHERE STATUS IN ('C','R') AND BIZ_RPS_YN = 'Y' )PI WHERE 1=1 AND AP.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND AP.BID_NO = ${BID_NO} AND AP.BID_COUNT = ${BID_COUNT} AND AP.HOUSE_CODE = VN.HOUSE_CODE AND AP.VENDOR_CODE = VN.VENDOR_CODE AND AP.HOUSE_CODE = PI.HOUSE_CODE AND AP.VENDOR_CODE = PI.VENDOR_CODE AND AP.BID_CANCEL = 'N' AND VN.HOUSE_CODE = AD.HOUSE_CODE AND VN.VENDOR_CODE = AD.CODE_NO AND AD.CODE_TYPE = '2' AND AP.STATUS IN ('C', 'R') ) A WHERE ORDER_SEQ = 1 ORDER BY A.VENDOR_CODE

SELECT CASE WHEN HD.BID_STATUS = 'AT' AND HD.SIGN_STATUS = 'T' THEN 'Y' WHEN HD.BID_STATUS = 'UT' AND HD.SIGN_STATUS = 'T' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END STATUS FROM ICOYBDHD_ICT HD WHERE HD.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND HD.BID_NO = ${BID_NO} AND HD.BID_COUNT = ${BID_COUNT}

SELECT (CASE WHEN HD.BID_STATUS IN (SELECT CODE FROM SCODE WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND TEXT3 BETWEEN '3' AND '5' ) THEN 'BT' ELSE 'BC' END) AS STATUS FROM ICOYBDHD HD WHERE HD.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND HD.BID_NO = ${BID_NO} AND HD.BID_COUNT = ${BID_COUNT} AND HD.STATUS IN ('C', 'R')
